FuelTank.NAME: Fuel Tank
FuelTank.FLAVOR: Taken from an old motorcycle, it now stores fuel for all kinds of nifty tools.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b

SignalFlag.NAME: Signal Flag
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 3 attacks in a turn, gain 1 Fuel.

Funnel.NAME: Funnel
Funnel.FLAVOR: Refuel your tools without spilling a single drop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Fuel, gain 1 additional Fuel.

ExhaustVents.NAME: Exhaust Vents
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you spend Fuel, apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.

MagnifyingGlass.NAME: Magnifying Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards can be upgraded any number of times during combat, improving damage and block by 20% after the first upgrade.
